keyword: how many calories in an in n out burger
title: How Many Calories in an In-N-Out Burger?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an in n out burger, including macros like protein and fat, plus tweaks and FAQs for the classic hamburger.
h1: How Many Calories in an In-N-Out Burger?
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: 100% beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and custom orders. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for updates.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out burger contains about 390 kcal and 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out burger?
What are the macros for an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: About 16 g protein, 19 g fat, 39 g carbs, with 3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does an In-N-Out burger have trans fat?
faqs.a: Yes, approximately 0.5 g from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Around 730 mg, mostly from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out burger calories for the basic version?
faqs.a: Yes; customizations like cheese or extra patties increase calories significantly.
